title: Vivo X Fold delivers bigger screen from ~$1,400, same camera sensor as Galaxy S22
content:
The foldable phone has become a popular device category, and the market is on the rise. Vivo has announced that the company is also capitalizing and releasing the Vivo X Fold, which will be a China-exclusive.

moreâ€¦

The post Vivo X Fold delivers bigger screen from ~$1,400, same camera sensor as Galaxy S22 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Vivo is making its mark with a new foldable. Taking notes from other existing foldables, the Vivo X Fold looks like a promising device.
